SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY B.REC_CZSJ DESC) RNO, B.*, WHR.USERNAME ||' '|| WHR.REALNAME WHR_REALNAME, SHR.USERNAME ||' '|| SHR.REALNAME NEW_SHR, PFR.USERNAME ||' '|| PFR.REALNAME NEW_PFR, XDR.USERNAME ||' '|| XDR.REALNAME XDR_REALNAME, to_char(XDQX, 'yyyy-mm-dd') NEW_XDQX, (CASE WHEN B.ZT =0 THEN '保存' WHEN B.ZT =1 THEN '提交' WHEN B.ZT =2 THEN '已审核' WHEN B.ZT =3 THEN '已批准' WHEN B.ZT =4 THEN '中止（关闭）' WHEN B.ZT =5 THEN '审核驳回' WHEN B.ZT =6 THEN '批准驳回' WHEN B.ZT =8 THEN '作废' WHEN B.ZT =9 THEN '关闭' WHEN B.ZT =10 THEN '完成' END) NEW_ZT, (CASE WHEN B.TZSLX = 1 THEN '维修方案' WHEN B.TZSLX = 2 THEN 'MEL' WHEN B.TZSLX = 3 THEN '工单' END) NEW_TZSLX , WHDW.DPRTNAME WHDW_DRPTNAME, '修订通知书编号:'||B.jszlh || ' ' || (CASE WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 0 THEN '创建' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 1 THEN '提交' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 2 THEN '已审核' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 3 THEN '已批准' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 4 THEN '中止（关闭）' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 5 THEN '审核驳回' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 6 THEN '批准驳回' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 8 THEN '作废' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 9 THEN '指定结束'
WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 10 THEN '完成' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 11 THEN '撤销' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 12 THEN '修改' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 13 THEN '改版' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 14 THEN '已生效' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 15 THEN '提交生产确认' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 16 THEN '借出确认' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 17 THEN '归还' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 18 THEN '导入' END) REC_HD, (CASE WHEN B.REC_CZLS = #{paramsMap.REC_CZLS,jdbcType=VARCHAR} THEN 'CURRENT' ELSE 'LAST' END) DATA_VERSION
FROM b_g_005_REC B LEFT JOIN T_USER WHR ON WHR.ID = B.rec_czrid LEFT JOIN T_USER SHR ON SHR.ID = B.SHRID LEFT JOIN T_USER PFR ON PFR.ID = B.PFRID LEFT JOIN T_USER XDR ON XDR.ID = B.xdrid LEFT JOIN T_DEPARTMENT WHDW ON WHDW.ID = B.zdbmid WHERE B.ID = #{paramsMap.ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND (select rec_czsj from b_g_005_REC where REC_CZLS = #{paramsMap.REC_CZLS,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ID = #{paramsMap.ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) >= b.rec_czsj ) WHERE 2 >=RNO

SELECT B.*, 'CURRENT' DATA_VERSION ,WHR.USERNAME||' '||WHR.REALNAME REC_CZR_NAME, (CASE WHEN B.REC_XGLX = 1 THEN '新增' WHEN B.REC_XGLX = 2 THEN '修改' WHEN B.REC_XGLX = 3 THEN '删除' END) REC_XGLX_TEXT ,
F_GETREC_HD(B.REC_CZSM) REC_HD
FROM D_011_REC B LEFT JOIN T_USER WHR ON WHR.ID = B.REC_CZRID
WHERE B.REC_ZBID = #{paramsMap.ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND B.REC_CZLS = #{paramsMap.REC_CZLS,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
UNION ALL
SELECT B.*, 'LAST' DATA_VERSION ,WHR.USERNAME||' '||WHR.REALNAME REC_CZR_NAME, (CASE WHEN B.REC_XGLX = 1 THEN '新增' WHEN B.REC_XGLX = 2 THEN '修改' WHEN B.REC_XGLX = 3 THEN '删除' END) REC_XGLX_TEXT ,
F_GETREC_HD(B.REC_CZSM) REC_HD
FROM D_011_REC B LEFT JOIN T_USER WHR ON WHR.ID = B.REC_CZRID
WHERE B.REC_ZBID = #{paramsMap.ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND B.REC_CZLS IN ( SELECT REC_CZLS FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY REC_CZSJ DESC) RNO , REC_CZLS FROM (select id,rec_czsj,rec_czls from b_g_005_rec ) A WHERE A.ID = #{paramsMap.ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.REC_CZSJ <= ( SELECT MIN(C.REC_CZSJ) FROM ( select id,rec_czsj,rec_czls from b_g_005_rec )C WHERE C.ID = #{paramsMap.ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND C.REC_CZLS = #{paramsMap.REC_CZLS,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) AND A.REC_CZLS != #{paramsMap.REC_CZLS,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) WHERE 1 = RNO )
